class hmkit.access_certificate.AccessCertificate(hmkit, cert=None)¶

Bases: object

Class handles access certificate download, parsing and get apis.

GAINING_PUBLIC_KEY_END = 86¶
GAINING_PUBLIC_KEY_START = 23¶
ISSUER_END = 4¶
ISSUER_START = 1¶
PERMISSIONS_START = 98¶
PERMISSION_SIZE_POS = 97¶
SER_GAINING_END = 22¶
SER_GAINING_START = 14¶
SER_PROVIDING_END = 13¶
SER_PROVIDING_START = 5¶
SIGNATURE_SIZE = 64¶
VALIDITY_END_DATE_END = 96¶
VALIDITY_END_DATE_START = 92¶
VALIDITY_START_DATE_END = 91¶
VALIDITY_START_DATE_START = 87¶
VERSION_POS = 0¶
download_access_certificate(access_token)¶

Downloads access ceritifcate from the hmserver with the access token passed.

Parameters

access_token (bytearray) – access token copied from high-mobility

Return type

None

get_end_date()¶

returns the end date of the access certificate

Returns

enddate

Return type

datetime.datetime

get_gaining_serial_number()¶

parses the gaining serial number from access certificate

Returns

serial number

Return type

bytearray

get_issuer()¶

returns the Certificate Issuer name from access certificate

Returns

Certificate Issuer name 4 bytes

Return type

bytearray

get_permissions()¶

returns permissions from access certificate

Returns

capability permissions

Return type

hmkit.autoapi.properties.permissions.Permissions

get_providing_serial_number()¶

parses the providing serial number from access certificate

Returns

serial number

Return type

bytearray

get_raw_certiticate()¶

get the parsed and base64 decoded certificate

Returns

raw access certificate

Return type

bytearray

get_start_date()¶

returns the start date of the access certificate

Returns

startdate

Return type

datetime.datetime

get_vehicle_pubkey()¶

returns the vehicle public key from access certificate

Returns

vehicle public key

Return type

bytearray

get_version()¶

returns the certificate version from access certificate

Returns

certificate version number

Return type

integer

is_expired()¶

Checks and returns expiry of the access certificate

Returns

Certificate date expiry status

Return type

True/False

is_not_valid_yet()¶

Checks validity start of the access certificate. Raspberry device must be set with correct time.

Returns

bool indicates if the certificate is not valid yet, but will be in the future.

Return type

True/False

parse_decoded_certiticate(cert)¶
print_access_certificate(accesscertf)¶

class hmkit.bluetooth.Bluetooth(pyc)¶

Bases: object

handles bluetooth advertisements control, callbacks registerations, connections

py_cb_command_incoming(msg)¶

callback for bluetooh incoming command message. Callback forwarded to Link

Parameters

msg (bytearray) – received message

Return type

None

py_cb_command_response(msg)¶

callback for bluetooth received responses. Callback forwarded to Link

Parameters

msg (bytearray) – received message

Return type

None

py_cb_entered_proximity(msg)¶

callback for bluetooth connection. Callback forwarded to broadcaster

Parameters

msg (bytearray) – received message

Return type

None

py_cb_exited_proximity(msg)¶

callback for bluetooth disconnection. Callback forwarded to broadcaster

Parameters

msg (bytearray) – received message

Return type

None

reg_callbacks()¶

registers own callback methods to python-c interface module

Return type

None

startBroadcasting()¶

Start Bluetooth Advertisement to seek connection

Return type

None

stopBroadcasting()¶

Stop Bluetooth Advertisement

Return type

None

class hmkit.broadcaster.Broadcaster¶

Bases: object

handles bluetooth connections and disconnections

connected(msg)¶

gets called for bluetooth connection. Invokes connected method of BroadcastListener

Parameters

msg (bytearray) – received message

Return type

None

disconnected(msg)¶

gets called for bluetooth disconnection. Invokes disconnected method of BroadcastListener

Parameters

msg (bytearray) – received message

Return type

None

is_connected()¶
set_listener(broadcastlistener)¶

setter for BroadcastListener. Connection Events received are relayed to broadcastlistener instance.

Parameters

broadcastlistener (broadcastlistener) – BroadcastListener object

Return type

None

class hmkit.broadcastlistener.BroadcastListener¶

Bases: abc.ABC

Abstract base class for broadcastlistener. Defines the blue print for broadcastlistening. Class and methods to be implemented by the app as defined here.

abstract connected(link)¶

Callback for bluetooth connection.

Parameters

Link (link) – Link object

Return type

None

abstract disconnected(link)¶

Callback for bluetooth disconnection.

Parameters

Link (link) – Link object

Return type

None

abstract state_changed(state)¶

Place holder api. Callback for bluetooth connection changes (TODO)

Parameters

state (state) –

Return type

None

Class handles device certificate parsing and provides getters for various parameters

ISSUER_END = 3¶
ISSUER_START = 0¶
PUBKEY_END = 88¶
PUBKEY_START = 25¶
SER_END = 25¶
SER_START = 16¶
SIGN_END = 152¶
SIGN_START = 89¶
devCertf = bytearray(b'')¶
get_app_identifier()¶

parses the appllication id from device certificate

Returns

application id

Return type

bytearray

Returns

serial number

Return type

Returns

issuer public key

Return type

update_devcertf(devcert)¶

Takes the decoded device certificate and parses it.

Parameters

devcert (bytearray) – decoded device certificate from the copied snippet from high-mobility server

Return type

None

class hmkit.hmkit.HmKit(snippet, loglevel=20)¶

Bases: object

Main class interface to initialize and access High mobility Python sdk hmkit

certificate_update(snippet)¶

Parses and updates the certificate to device_certificate and hm_pyc

Parameters

snippet (bytearray) – device certificate snippet

Return type

None

cmain_thread()¶

thread function dedicated to c thread operations

download_access_certificate(token)¶

Pass the Access token to access_certificate to download Access Certificate

Parameters

token (bytearray) – Access Token for device

Return type

None

get_certificate(serial)¶

returns the Access Certificate

Parameters

serial (bytearray) – Serial Number

Returns

AccessCertificate() object that contains the received Access certificate

Return type

access_certificate.AccessCertificate()

static get_instance()¶

get the HmKit instance

Return type

HmKit. returns None if not created already.

hmkit_exit()¶

terminate hmkit. this terminates the cthreads

init_threads()¶

create a python thread. which will be deligated for c

set_logging_level(loglevel=20)¶

set logging level for logger

Parameters

loglevel (logging) – python logging level for hmkit logs. logging.DEBUG, logging.INFO, logging.WARNING ,logging.ERROR, logging.CRITICAL

Return type

None

class hmkit.link.Link(pyc)¶

Bases: object

Class handles data communication with the bluetooth connected link

cb_command_incoming(cmd)¶

Callback, Incoming command Data received from the bluetooth connected link is forwarded here, That is again forwarded to the registered linklistener.

Parameters

cmd (bytearray) – Incoming command bytearray

Return type

None

cb_command_response(cmd)¶

Callback, Incoming response Data received from the bluetooth connected link is forwarded here, That is again forwarded to the registered linklistener.

Parameters

cmd (bytearray) – Incoming response bytearray

Return type

None

sendcommand(msg)¶

send the message to the bluetooth connected link

Parameters

msg (bytearray) – data bytearray to be sent through bluetooth

Return type

None

set_listener(linklistener)¶

setter for LinkListener. Data received from connected link are relayed to linklistener instance.

Parameters

linklistener (linklistener) – LinkListener object

Return type

None

state_changed(state)¶

[TODO] Callback, Incoming response Data received from the bluetooth connected link is forwarded here, That is again forwarded to the registered linklistener.

Parameters

state – change in connected link state

Return type

None

class hmkit.linklistener.LinkListener¶

Bases: abc.ABC

Abstract base class for linklistener. Defines the blue print for linklistening. Class and methods to be implemented by the app as defined here.

abstract command_incoming(link, cmd)¶

Abstract Method, to be implemented by the App Callback for incoming commands received from bluetooth link. Change in States will be received in this callback

Parameters

  • Link (link) – Link object

  • cmd (bytearray) – data received

Return type

None

abstract command_response(link, cmd)¶

Abstract Method, to be implemented by the App Callback for command response received from bluetooth link Usually reflects Acknowledgements

Parameters

  • Link (link) – Link object

  • cmd (bytearray) – data received

Return type

None
